lead_paragraph: The former world champion pole-vaulter Giuseppe Gibilisco was barred for two years yesterday for his alleged role in the Oil for Drugs case.Gibilisco and several other athletes have been linked in the case to an Italian doctor who allegedly supplied doping products.Gibilisco won the world title in 2003 and Olympic bronze in 2004.
